description: Issaacs girlfriend wants to have a threesome with another guy. Issaac goes to his friend Brett to see if he can set this up. Bretts happy to oblige, hes always been close to Issaac. He thinks he better put it to the test now though before the three of them get together and it turns into a big mess. Brett wants to make sure Issaac can take it from him. First he lets Issaac blow him and then proceeds to fuck him in multiple positions. Satisfied with what hes observed Brett cums on Issacs stomach followed by Issac doing the same.
title: Wood Hard
